etymologies: early 21st century: coined by the US film critic Nathan Rabin in a critique of the character type and its prevalence

definitions: (especially in film) a type of female character depicted as vivacious and appealingly quirky, whose main purpose within the narrative is to inspire a greater appreciation for life in a male protagonist

examples.text: she turns the male fantasy of the manic pixie dream girl on its ear

shortDefinitions: female character who inspires greater appreciation for life in male protagonist
